mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(latest_refund_rate,0) latest_refund_rate,IFNULL(latest_complain_rate,0) latest_complain_rate FROM sy_platform_stats WHERE rec_id=(SELECT MAX(rec_id) FROM sy_platform_stats)
